      • ingredientDialog

        protected void ingredientDialog()
        This method creates a dialog with three edit texts, for ingredient, quantity, and unit of measurement. There is a 'Cancel' and 'Ok' button.

      • editIngredientDialog

        protected void editIngredientDialog(int index)
        This method creates a dialog with three edit texts, for ingredient, quantity, and unit of measurement. There is a 'Cancel' and 'Ok' button.
        Parameters:
        index - The index in each array list of the current item.
